prompt:
Create a webtoon/manga panel in webtoon art style.

LIGHTING: day time - use appropriate day lighting (bright, natural sunlight)

STYLE CONSISTENCY (use reference for style only, NOT content):
- Match the art style, color palette from reference
- Character: same appearance (hair, clothes) but NEW pose for this action
- Do NOT copy or trace the reference image
- Same location, but lighting shifts to a cooler, sickly tone in the periphery.

SCENE:
- Location: The School Hallway - Normal to others, but a horror show for Mina. The lighting shifts when she focuses on spirits.- Shot: wide establishing shot showing full environment and characters
- Angle: dutch angle (tilted), creates tension or unease

CHARACTERS (draw with correct human anatomy and proportions):
- Character 'Mina Kim' (short black bob hair, pale skin, large white headphones, oversized beige cardigan, tired dark circles under eyes) - Expression: neutral - Position: left of frame

ACTION: The camera pans slightly to reveal what Mina is ignoring. Grotesque, shadowy spirits are clinging to the lockers and hanging upside down from the ceiling tiles, reaching out toward passing students.

FORMAT:
- FULL BLEED: artwork extends to ALL edges, no white borders
- No speech bubbles or text in the image

QUALITY:
- Clean linework, correct anatomy and body proportions
- Expressive faces, dynamic poses
- Professional webtoon art quality

panel_data.action: The camera pans slightly to reveal what Mina is ignoring. Grotesque, shadowy spirits are clinging to the lockers and hanging upside down from the ceiling tiles, reaching out toward passing students.
panel_data.continuity_note: Same location, but lighting shifts to a cooler, sickly tone in the periphery.
